name: International Norwegian Board
headAddress: 158942 York House Green Lane West  United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
goal:
The International Norwegian Board is committed to continuously upgrading the quality of educational performance and professional training at various levels, through genuine partnership with training institutions within the EU. We work with the LLPlatform Learning Platform, Which combines 41 bodies within the EU and internationally. In order to achieve Excellency in preparation of qualified trainees, conducting scientific research, development of vocabulary and modernized through the trends of the contemporary world.
The Norwegian International Board in all its activities is committed to establish a set of values, represented in openness on other nationalities and emphasizing on the identity of the Arab world and the Islamic believes.
Moreover, INB works to link INB & other European organizations to adopt its curriculum.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Communication, Culture and media, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: New Erasmus+ programme post 2020. Education and skills. Innovation, research and entrepreneurship.
